quest.name: Sparking Artist
journal:
Managingway is gazing at you, nose twitching in anxiety.

â€»Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Speak with Sparkingway in northern Mare Lamentorum.
Hit Sparkingway with a carrotsine tank.
Hit Sparkingway with a carrotsine tank again.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Forename. I am in desperate need of your assistance.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: We have recently discovered a genius among our Ways. Her indubitable skill and logic-defying innovation have quickly shown her to be a paragon of the Loporrit art world.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Consider my distress, then, when she came to me seeking an assistant. Though all our Ways possess eagerness and creativity in bounds, none, I fear, could understand her vision. None, perhaps, except you.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Her name is Sparkingway, and I have been told to direct you to the Striking Brand in northern Mare Lamentorum where she waits. I cannot claim to understand the methods of a genius, but I beg that you assist her with whatever she requires.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Sparkingway, our resident artistic genius, has requested your assistance once more. It seems she was greatly impressed by your dedication last time.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: She says she will be waiting for you by the Striking Brand, as before. Take care, Forename. And thank you.

dialogue.name: SPARKINGWAY
dialogue.text: You must be Forename. Managingway said you would come. My name is Sparkingway.

dialogue.name: SPARKINGWAY
dialogue.text: I hear you are comfortable with handling explosive materials. That is comforting to hear, indeed. Here. Throw this at me.

dialogue.name: SPARKINGWAY
dialogue.text: There is no need to look so alarmed. As far as carrotsine tanks go, it is rather small. Although just as liable to ignite upon impact.

dialogue.name: SPARKINGWAY
dialogue.text: Art is pain, Forename. And pain is inspiration. So throw it at me. Throw with all your might!

dialogue.name: SPARKINGWAY
dialogue.text: Forename. How good it is to see you again.

dialogue.name: SPARKINGWAY
dialogue.text: Our artistic gains from last time proved well worth the singed fur. The wonders I created were unlike any I have ever produced. But the dream of an artist is not to rest upon her laurels. We are always hungry, Forename. Aching for the next idea.

dialogue.name: SPARKINGWAY
dialogue.text: Aching as my body will once you hit me with this carrotsine tank. Now throw, my friend. Throw with the strength of art!

dialogue.name: SPARKINGWAY
dialogue.text: Come! Strike me!

dialogue.name: SPARKINGWAY
dialogue.text: Guwahaaa! <gasp>

dialogue.name: SPARKINGWAY
dialogue.text: ...O-Once more. I have not seen it yet. Not felt it sear my eyes. Hit me, Forename! One more time!

dialogue.name: SPARKINGWAY
dialogue.text: Be not afraid of greatness! Throw!

dialogue.name: SPARKINGWAY
dialogue.text:
Eyaaagh! Kch! <cough> <cough>
...I have it.

dialogue.name: SPARKINGWAY
dialogue.text: O spark of inspiration... With this broken form...I shall create you...

dialogue.name: SPARKINGWAY
dialogue.text: Thank you, Forename. Managingway will see that you are duly rewarded. I must return to my atelier before the light of my eyes or inspiration fades...

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: I believe I heard an explosion... Erm, I trust Sparkingway was satisfied with your assistance?

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Well, you do often hear of artists suffering for their craft, so I imagine the scale for geniuses must exceed all supposition. I do hope she manages to finish her art before art finishes her, as it were.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: I shall check upon her later to see if she requires any further assistance. In the meantime, please accept this as thanks for supporting the proliferation and success of Loporrit fine art.
